oh God..didnt see e cam audio part :@ its sooo bad
A-3
The sound is microphone recorded! Some parts are spoken in spanish. Sounds like a fart in a can. My advice is to wait for a better copy...

Gee, if all of you "internet savvy" folks would bother to do some research, you'd find out that the DVD isn't scheduled for a USA release until January, 2011. All the dl out there are either Euro releases or cam-corder copies. Me, I'm gonna wait the two months and get a proper copy.  Don't bother to dl ANY copies till then.
